scripts.chromeMobileAndTabView: npx playwright test --headed --project=ChromePixel5 --grep @mobileView && npx playwright test --headed --project=ChromeGalaxyS4 --grep @tabView
scripts.safariMobileAndTabView: npx playwright test --headed --project=SafariiPhone12 --grep @mobileView && npx playwright test --headed --project=SafariIpad --grep @tabView
scripts.desktopViewInAllBrowser: npx playwright test --headed --project=chromium --grep @desktopView && npx playwright test --headed --project=firefox --grep @desktopView && npx playwright test --headed --project=webkit --grep @desktopView
